item.title: Grokking Algorithms
item.description: summary of “Grokking Algorithms” Book i think this is the best “short” book to review Algorithm lecture that taught in College if you want to review Algorithm lecture, i recommend this book

item.title: The 10x Rules
item.description: summary of The 10X Rules Book in nutshell : “Success is your duty and you have to work beyond average (10x) to be successful”
